page.about.description.aboutCraftRoots1: Craft roots is an initiative of Gramshree to link the output of traditional artisans with the global markets. Over two decades, the organisation and initiative has touched more than 45 craft forms and engaged with over 25000 artisans. Craft roots has successfully supported and reviving ancient craft forms by adding value to the ecosystem.
page.about.description.aboutCraftRoots2: Handicraft is a living document of the 5000 year old tradition, technology and artisanal brilliance: survived by relentless hard work of crafts people, over generations. Craft roots is working towards the creation  of an encouraging ecosystem for the crafts with an aim to add value to the progress of artisans — the carriers of these ancient traditions. By employing a three-pronged strategy of Revival, Austenance and Sharing, Craft roots is working to provide the artisans a rightful place amidst the socio-economic echelons of society.
page.about.title.ForTheWomenByTheWomen: For the women, by the women
page.about.description.ForTheWomenByTheW: As advocates and leaders of sustainable progress, we aim to protect India’s rich artisanal handcraft legacy while also empowering rural craftsmen, particularly women. Craft roots has under the auspices of it’s parent trust, Gramshree has achieved phenomenal progress in empowering and uplifting marginalised and underprivileged rural women by proving training and support to create garments. With a long term socio economic impact at the root of these activities, Craft roots aims to bring a conscious shift in the society.
page.about.description.ourFlagshipStore1: Our organisational philosophy of leading a life of minimalism gradually pushed us to transition to an eco-friendly, ergonomically constructed environment where life and business are centred on conservation. We are relocating our headquarters to the lap of nature in Ahmedabad, near Lilapar, to a campus that makes the most use of the elements of air, water, and sunshine to create a work atmosphere that is in harmony with the natural surroundings.
page.about.description.ourFlagshipStore2: The search for greener potential solutions is a journey wherein we make a coordinated effort to minimize our environmental footprint.
